verbs.description: < p > [ARG0: The White House] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Thursday] [ARG1: it is moving ahead with plans for a summit between President Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un , despite Pyongyang 's recent threats to scrap] it.</p >
< p > The White House said Thursday it [V: is] moving ahead with plans for a summit between President Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un , despite Pyongyang 's recent threats to scrap it.</p >

< p > The White House said Thursday [ARG0: it] is [V: moving] [ARGM-DIR: ahead] [ARG1: with plans for a summit between President Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] , [ARGM-ADV: despite Pyongyang 's recent threats to scrap] it.</p >
< p > The White House said Thursday it is moving ahead with plans for a summit between President Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un , despite Pyongyang 's recent threats to [V: scrap] it.</p >
